boardgame.description: In Circus Flohcati, players try to complete sets of cards before the game ends. A player begins her turn with several face-up cards to choose from. If she doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t like them, she can draw another, but if a card gets turned up that matches the suit of one of the other face-up cards, she loses her turn. She can continue drawing until she likes one or it matches. Also during her turn she can combine three cards of the same value and lay them down in front of her; such sets will be worth 10 points at the end of the game. Additionally, the highest card from each suit in her hand contributes its face value to her score._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Most editions of Circus Flohcati bear a player count of 3-5, but the 2016 edition from Grail Games boasts a 2-5 player count with no changes to the rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game #5 in 'The Mike Line' of games from Grail Games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

RIO Grande Games (RIO213) Game Description: The world-renowned Flohcati Brothers circus is in town, but with lions and tigers and bears, oh no! This is the smallest circus known to man: the flea circus. Players compete to collect the best fleas of each kind. Be the first to collect all ten and you could be the winner! Reiner offers other ways to score along the way, so getting 10 kinds will not guarantee a victory. As always, Reiner offers several ways to score and scratch your way to victory. Author: Reiner Knizia

Grail Games (GRL1696) Circus Flohcati, is an exciting, push-your-luck card game from famed designer Reiner Knizia. During the game, players will attempt to collect all the acts required for a flea circus that will be the toast of the town. But be careful! Risk too much and any ringmaster can go bust. Will you be cautious or cavalier? Will the audience flock, or will they flee?

In person cash sales only. Box opened, but unplayed and cards still in shrink. Edition/Language: Rio Grande - English edition (2004). English rules. Components: Cards are in shrink. Complete. Box: Excellent condition. Very minor wear on back.

NOTE: GERMAN edition, CARD game. Bought new, played once, put away. In excellent condition, only listed as VG as it has been played. Box and contents in perfect condition, like new. My copy comes with a print out of the English rules. UK BUYERS - Very cost effective to get two or three games. MyHermes, 0-1kg starts at £2.79, but up to 10kg is from just £6.49. Adding one or two more games is very good value for you. 10kg gets you a lot of games. Happy to receive Paypal in GBP, USD, JPY, EUR. Can provide photos of my copy on request (message me your email). UK - Can ship quickly cheaply by courier. Europe - Can ship quickish by Royal Mail USA / CAN - Royal Mail up to 2kg - various services and prices, ask for info. Over 2kg, ship by Parcelforce. Other locations will research when I get an order. I am looking at other options, but international couriers are expensive in the UK. On Paypal if you make payment as a cash gift to me, I am not charged a fee by Paypal (may differ if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re outside the UK) but you receive no protection in a dispute. If the Paypal payment is a commercial transaction, Paypal charges me near 4% of the payment so you get dispute protection. Of course, you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know me from a hole in the ground. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your right to protection obviously. But please consider adding a touch to the payment to help cover this fee.
